Content:: Karunadasa Kodithuwakku (Sinhala: කරුණාදාස කොඩිතුවක්කු; born 15 June 1961) is a Sri Lankan politician and Member of Parliament.[1] Kodithuwakku was born on 15 June 1961.[1] He was educated at Horagoda Maha Vidyalaya.[2] He is a businessman.[2] Kodithuwakku contested the 2020 parliamentary election as a Sri Lanka People's Freedom Alliance electoral alliance candidate in Matara District and was elected to the Parliament of Sri Lanka.[3][4][5]  This article about a politician from Southern Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Karuna Kodithuwakku - Wikipedia
